subject: Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: In Brazil, soccer is a religion and its stars, like Pelé and Ronaldo, are revered as gods. But rugby is the second-fastest-growing sport there, behind mixed martial arts.
snippet: In Brazil, soccer is a religion and its stars, like Pelé and Ronaldo, are revered as gods. But rugby is the second-fastest-growing sport there, behind mixed martial arts.
